global.summary: Total Column Cloud Water corresponding to Remote Sensing Systems (RSS) Resampled brightness temperature
global.keywords: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > CLOUDS > CLOUD MICROPHYSICS > CLOUD LIQUID WATER
global.title: Total Column Cloud Water from ERA5 on a 0.25 degree Earth grid, time interpolated to satellite overpass time
global.history: Created from ERA5 data downloaded from the Copernicus Climate Data Store
global.source: Hersbach, H., Bell, B., Berrisford, P., Hirahara, S., Horányi, A., Muñoz-Sabater, J., et al. 2020). The ERA5 global reanalysis. Quarterly Journal of the Royal Meteorological Society, 146(730), 1999–2049. https://doi.org/10.1002/qj.3803. ERA5 hourly data on single levels from 1959 to present. 0.25 degree x 0.25 degree gridded data downloaded from the Copernicus Climate Data Store. Dataset DOI: 10.24381/cds.adbb2d47

var.long_name: Total column cloud liquid water interpolated from hourly ERA5 output
